definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

pinyin: Bu4 yi2 nuo4 si1 Ai4 li4 si1

definition: human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up
Dwight D. Eisenhower (1890-1969), US army general and politician, Supreme Allied Commander in Europe during World War II, US President 1953-1961
Ai Weiwei (1957-), Chinese artist active in architecture, photography, film, as well as cultural criticism and political activism
to be full of remorse/to repent and redress one's errors

sentences.english: My name is Evert , and I come from Holland.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字叫艾福特，来自荷兰。

sentences.english: Ania lives at No. 34, Green Street.
sentences.chinese: 艾尼雅住在格林大街34号。

sentences.english: Phillips Park was bordered by Pelee Boulevard and Elmhurst.
sentences.chinese: 菲力浦公园的两边是比利大道及艾尔姆霍斯特大街。

sentences.english: The Idea-Tops I think it is a great idea.
sentences.chinese: 我认为艾特奖是个很好的概念。

sentences.english: Music video by Idlewild performing Love Steals Us From Loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 艾德威尔德表演爱音乐视频失误，我们的孤独。

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from volcanic ash April 17, 2010 near Eyjafjallajokull, Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛艾雅法拉火山附近马群逃离火山灰。

sentences.english: Julia said, raking the ground. “Yeh can call me Elina if you’d like.”
sentences.chinese: “茱莉亚刨着地说，”你也可以叫我艾琳娜。”

sentences.english: I called the local hospice after consulting with Dr. Isaacoff.
sentences.chinese: 向艾萨科夫咨询后，我打电话给当地临终医院。

sentences.english: Airdrie, you were my best friend and my closest connection.
sentences.chinese: 艾尔德里你是我最好的朋友和最亲密的人。

sentences.english: That night Iris rang up Jack again.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，艾瑞斯又打电话给杰克。

sentences.english: Alex's spending on food this month went over budget.
sentences.chinese: 艾力克斯这个月的伙食费超出了预算。

sentences.english: Sharpton says he wants Imus to be fired.
sentences.chinese: 沙普顿表示他希望艾默斯被开除。

sentences.english: But Isis is sort of like Artemis.
sentences.chinese: 艾西斯有点像阿尔忒弥斯。

sentences.english: On Friday midday I passed by the large Square in front of the Id Kah mosque in Kashgar.
sentences.chinese: 星期五中午我路过艾提尕尔清真寺前的广场。

sentences.english: Emperor all of the imperial palace welcomed two guests, is exactly Liu Feng and moxa Lin Nuo.
sentences.chinese: 帝都的皇宫迎来了两名客人，正是柳风和艾琳娜。

definition: (phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]
